testimonials.name: Michael R. Thompson
testimonials.title: CEO, Thompson Manufacturing
testimonials.text: Reesor & Associates recovered $425,000 from a stubborn debtor in just 45 days. Their professional approach and legal expertise made all the difference. Highly recommended for any business facing collection challenges.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: CFO, TechFlow Solutions
testimonials.text: We had given up on recovering $295,000 from a defaulted client. Reesor & Associates achieved a 92% recovery rate in under 40 days. Their expertise in commercial debt collection is unmatched.

testimonials.name: David Martinez
testimonials.title: Owner, Elite Construction
testimonials.text: Professional, efficient, and results-driven. They recovered 100% of our $225,000 debt in less than a month. Their understanding of business relationships is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Adams
testimonials.title: Finance Director, MedCore Health
testimonials.text: Reesor & Associates handled our complex healthcare equipment lease dispute with utmost professionalism. They recovered $490,000 while maintaining our business relationships intact.
